actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to provide for an investigation by the General Services Administration of various problems involved in providing toll-free telephone numbers for incoming calls at each regional office of most executive agencies.

summary.text: Provides for an ivestigation by the General Services Administration of various problems involved in providing toll-free telephone numbers for incoming calls at each regional office of specified executive agencies. Authorizes necessary appropriations to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for an investigation by the General Services Administration of various problems involved in providing toll-free telephone numbers for incoming calls at each regional office of most executive agencies.
